languages.text: "Теперь, когда я нашел опору в реальном мире, я должен понять, как мне вернуть себе кабал. Иремерисс мертва, и Опустошительная буря будет явно отдана на растерзание Комморре... впрочем, если они позволят себя сразить, особой жалости к этим ничтожествам я не буду испытывать".

"Now that I have gained a foothold in realspace, I must find a way to win back my Kabal. Yremeryss is dead and the Reaving Tempest will be torn apart by Commorragh... But if they allow themselves to be slaughtered, I will feel no particular pity for that worthless scum."
languages.original_text: "Теперь, когда я нашел опору в реальном мире, я должен понять, как мне вернуть себе кабал. Иремерисс мертва, и Опустошительная буря будет явно отдана на растерзание Комморре... впрочем, если они позволят себя сразить, особой жалости к этим ничтожествам я не буду испытывать".

traits.locale_text: "Now that I have gained a foothold in realspace, I must find a way to win back my Kabal. Yremeryss is dead and the Reaving Tempest will be torn apart by Commorragh... But if they do not let themselves fight, I will feel no particular pity for that worthless scum."

"Now that I have gained a foothold in realspace, I must find a way to win back my Kabal. Yremeryss is dead and the Reaving Tempest will be torn apart by Commorragh... But if they do not let themselves fight, I will feel no particular pity for that worthless scum."

"Now that I have gained a foothold in realspace, I must find a way to win back my Kabal. Yremeryss is dead and the Reaving Tempest will be torn apart by Commorragh... But if they do not let themselves fight, I will feel no particular pity for that worthless scum."

"Now that I have gained a foothold in realspace, I must find a way to win back my Kabal. Yremeryss is dead and the Reaving Tempest will be torn apart by Commorragh... But if they do not let themselves fight, I will feel no particular pity for that worthless scum."

languages.text: «Ahora que he establecido una cabeza de puente en el espacio real, debo encontrar la forma de recuperar mi Kábala. Yremeryss está muerta y Comorragh hará pedazos a la Tempestad Asoladora... Pero si se dejan masacrar, no sentiré ninguna pena por esa chusma inútil».
languages.original_text: "Now that I have gained a foothold in realspace, I must find a way to win back my Kabal. Yremeryss is dead and the Reaving Tempest will be torn apart by Commorragh... But if they allow themselves to be slaughtered, I will feel no particular pity for that worthless scum."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora que he establecido una cabeza de puente en el espacio real, debo encontrar la forma de recuperar mi Kábala. Yremeryss está muerta y Comorragh hará pedazos a la Tempestad Asoladora... Pero si se dejan masacrar, no sentiré ninguna pena por esa chusma inútil».

languages.text: “既然我已经在真实世界站稳了脚跟，那我必须想办法夺回我的阴谋团。伊芮梅莉斯已经死了，狂风阴谋团会被科摩罗撕成碎片……但如果那些废物打算就这么引颈受戮，我也不打算可怜那些没用的渣滓。”
languages.original_text: "Now that I have gained a foothold in realspace, I must find a way to win back my Kabal. Yremeryss is dead and the Reaving Tempest will be torn apart by Commorragh... But if they allow themselves to be slaughtered, I will feel no particular pity for that worthless scum."

traits.locale_text: “既然我已经在真实世界站稳了脚跟，那我必须想办法夺回我的阴谋团。伊芮梅莉斯已经死了，狂风阴谋团会被科摩罗撕成碎片……但如果那些废物打算就这么引颈受戮，我也不打算可怜那些没用的渣滓。”

languages.text: 「これでリアルスペースに足がかりができた。陰謀団を取り戻す方法を見つけなければ。イレメリスは死んだ。略奪の嵐もコモラフによって引き裂かれるだろう…だがもし奴らが虐殺されるようなことがあれば、俺様があの役立たずのクズどもに同情することなどないだろうな」
languages.original_text: "Now that I have gained a foothold in realspace, I must find a way to win back my Kabal. Yremeryss is dead and the Reaving Tempest will be torn apart by Commorragh... But if they allow themselves to be slaughtered, I will feel no particular pity for that worthless scum."

traits.locale_text: 「これでリアルスペースに足がかりができた。陰謀団を取り戻す方法を見つけなければ。イレメリスは死んだ。略奪の嵐もコモラフによって引き裂かれるだろう…だがもし奴らが虐殺されるようなことがあれば、俺様があの役立たずのクズどもに同情することなどないだろうな」

languages.text: « Maintenant que j'ai un point d'appui dans l'espace réel, il me faut trouver un moyen de reprendre les rênes de ma Kabale. Yremeryss est morte et la Tempête ravageuse exposée aux rapaces de Commorragh... Mais si ses membres se laissent massacrer, je n'aurai aucune pitié pour ce ramassis de bons à rien. »
languages.original_text: "Now that I have gained a foothold in realspace, I must find a way to win back my Kabal. Yremeryss is dead and the Reaving Tempest will be torn apart by Commorragh... But if they allow themselves to be slaughtered, I will feel no particular pity for that worthless scum."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que j'ai un point d'appui dans l'espace réel, il me faut trouver un moyen de reprendre les rênes de ma Kabale. Yremeryss est morte et la Tempête ravageuse exposée aux rapaces de Commorragh... Mais si ses membres se laissent massacrer, je n'aurai aucune pitié pour ce ramassis de bons à rien. »

languages.text: "Nun, da ich im Realraum Fuß gefasst habe, muss ich einen Weg finden, meine Kabale zurückzugewinnen. Yremeryss ist tot, und der plündernde Sturm wird von Commorragh in Stücke gerissen werden ... Aber wenn sie sich abschlachten lassen, habe ich kein sonderlich großes Mitleid mit diesem wertlosen Abschaum."
languages.original_text: "Now that I have gained a foothold in realspace, I must find a way to win back my Kabal. Yremeryss is dead and the Reaving Tempest will be torn apart by Commorragh... But if they allow themselves to be slaughtered, I will feel no particular pity for that worthless scum."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, da ich im Realraum Fuß gefasst habe, muss ich einen Weg finden, meine Kabale zurückzugewinnen. Yremeryss ist tot, und der plündernde Sturm wird von Commorragh in Stücke gerrissen werden ... Aber wenn sie sich abschlachten lassen, habe ich kein sonderlich großes Mitleid mit diesem wertlosen Abschaum."

languages.original_text: "Now that I have gained a foothold in realspace, I must find a way to win back my Kabal. Yremeryss is dead and the Reaving Tempest will be torn apart by Commorragh... But if they do not let themselves fight, I will feel no particular pity for that worthless scum."

languages.text: "Artık gerçekuzayda kendime bir yer edindiğime göre Kabalımı geri kazanmaya odaklanabilirim. Yremeryss öldü, Müfteris Kasırga'yı da Commorragh yaşatmayacaktır... Gerçi karşı koyacak cesaretleri yoksa beter olsunlar. Hiç üzülecek değilim."
languages.original_text: "Now that I have gained a foothold in realspace, I must find a way to win back my Kabal. Yremeryss is dead and the Reaving Tempest will be torn apart by Commorragh... But if they allow themselves to be slaughtered, I will feel no particular pity for that worthless scum."

traits.locale_text: "Artık gerçekuzayda kendime bir yer edindiğime göre Kabalımı geri kazanmaya odaklanabilirim. Yremeryss öldü, Müfteris Kasırga'yı da Commorragh yaşatmayacaktır... Gerçi karşı koyacak cesaretleri yoksa beter olsunlar. Hiç üzülecek değilim."
